amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for DHS to partner with the State Department to establish Safe Mobility Offices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
